forest.description: A sprawling, untamed forest region, recently discovered.

The trees grow closer here, their branches blocking out the sun. The air is {adjective} and still.
A small, quiet clearing. Patches of {adjective} moss cover the ground.
An ancient, gnarled tree dominates this area, its roots like massive claws.

room_descriptions: A large, open cavern with stalactites hanging from the ceiling. The sound of dripping water echoes.
The passage narrows here, forcing you to squeeze through. The walls are {adjective} and damp.
A wide chamber filled with the fluttering of wings. The smell of guano is strong.
A shallow underground stream cuts through this part of the cave, its water {adjective} and cold.
Clusters of glowing crystals cast an eerie, {adjective} light around this grotto.
A rugged trail winds upwards. The air is thin and {adjective}.
You stand on a high, windswept ridge with a commanding view of the area.
The path narrows to a dangerous ledge with a sheer drop on one side.
A steep, crumbling slope of loose rock makes footing treacherous.
